exps.project_one: Developing stand-alone and web based Geographical  Information System for Bandarawela Municipal Council,  focused on handling geographical data on Road Development  Authority (RDA) and Survey Department. Data structure is  being developed using a quality standardized Land  Administrative Domain Modal.
exps.project_two: Developing a web based GIS application for Sabaragamuwa  Provincial Agriculture Department for managing geospatial  data on Grama Sewa Divisions, District Secretariat Divisions,  District Division and Provincial vice.
exps.project_three: Developing a Content Management System for Sabaragamuwa  Provincial Agriculture Department to access web GIS  application features within different administrative level.

exps.project_one: Working with well established world wide customer base and meet with clients to determine the scope of large projects.
exps.project_two: Design layouts, including selection of colors, images, and typefaces using professional software to help deliver the message by the client
exps.project_three: Review designs for errors before printing or publishing them and incorporate changed recommended by clients or art directors into final outcome.
